quest.name: True as Steel
journal: Forgemaster Brithael has a special task for you.
Hoping to win new contracts for the guild, Brithael has asked you to produce another sample. Craft a high-quality steel ingot and deliver it to Faezahr, who will once again handle negotiations.

Your expertly forged steel serves to elevate you further in Faezahr's esteem, but his opinion of Brithael remains as low as ever. Despite his scorn for the forgemaster, he pledges to recommend the guild's services to prospective clients.

※The next blacksmith quest will be available from Brithael upon reaching level 30.
objectives: Deliver a steel ingot to Faezahr.

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: Ye've come a long way since ye first joined up, lasslad. Some smitties might be content to eke out a livin' sellin' cheap tools an' weapons, but not you. You won't be satisfied till yer the best, am I right?

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: Aye, that's the stuff. Always seekin' to better yerself, ain't ye? I respect that.

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: If ye've no motivation, it's only a matter o' time before yer work starts to suffer. Yer customers start lookin' elsewhere, folks start whisperin' yer best days're behind ye, yer wife runs off with a godsdamned merchant...

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: An' next thing ye know, yer jus' another poor sod drownin' his sorrows at the Wench. But that won't happen to you, will it?

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: Ye produced quality work back when we had to deal with them treefolk, an' now I need ye to do the same again. We're after another big contract, see.

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: There's a bloke in town who's lookin' to buy a boatload o' steel, but he won't place an order till he's sure we can deliver first-rate stuff. So we need to send him a sample of our finest work.

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: Now, it takes a lot o' skill to forge a bar o' high-quality steel, but if ye've got all the ingredients, yer halfway there.

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: ...Sayin' that, it can still be a right pain in the arse.

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: But I know yer up to the task, lasslad. When ye've made the thing, give it to that whoreson merchant from before─Faezahr, aye─so as he can deliver it to the client.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The higher the quality achieved during synthesis, the greater the chance that the finished item will be of a higher grade (HQ).

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: To be deleted.

dialogue.name: FAEZAHL
dialogue.text: We meet again. Assuming you're here to deliver the steel, know this: if it's not first-rate, I won't present it to the client.

dialogue.name: FAEZAHL
dialogue.text: Hmmm. Very well. Inside, smith.

dialogue.name: FAEZAHL
dialogue.text: Quite how you learned to smelt such excellent steel I don't know. But I do know that it had naught to do with your wretched mentor's teaching...

dialogue.name: FAEZAHL
dialogue.text: Hmmm... Harder than mere iron, yet not so rigid as to be unworkable...

dialogue.name: FAEZAHL
dialogue.text: It cannot have been easy determining the exact quantity of bomb ash required to achieve such a balance.

dialogue.name: FAEZAHL
dialogue.text: Speaking of which, just how did you acquire the ash? Don't tell me you went and slew the voidsent fiends yourself!

dialogue.name: FAEZAHL
dialogue.text: The markets are hardly a reliable source, I know, but risking death in a fiery explosion is beyond reckless!

dialogue.name: FAEZAHL
dialogue.text: Still, if that's what it took...I admire your dedication.

dialogue.name: FAEZAHL
dialogue.text: I suspect your forgemaster will soon be receiving some good news. I only hope he remembers to toast your name when he adjourns to the Wench to celebrate.

obj.n: By the Sweat of Your Brow
